name: Casa Marisa
description: Casa Marisa 2.0 is constructed over a huge lava stream of the recent volcanic eruption of 2014. during this eruption Casa Marisa was totally destroyed. The reconstruction was finished 10 months after destruction of the original house. It is the only establishment in the Caldeiras with 24/7 electricity (solar) and warm water (solar, geothermic). The floors of the house are still warm from the cooling lava. It is perfectly suited for the start of the most popular excursions and professional information and organisation of all kind of activities are the expertise of the team. The activities range from easy walks up to professional niveau climbing and alpinism. Breakfast service starts from 5:30am! We speak Portuguese, Creole, German, English and French - and we do speak with you. The size of 14 rooms and a huge restaurant still provides a familial atmosphere and gives us time to contact all our clients personally. Cha Das Caldeiras is a remote, simple and very authentic place - and so is Casa Marisa. The luxury of the house is an excellent kitchen and local vine products and a very personal service, not luxury suites. We do give maximum attention to be sustainable. Almost all our food is from the rural products of the Caldeiras and the Islands of Cabo Verde, Marisa and all our team are born and grown up in the Caldeiras and we reuse water, all bottles and our energy is 100% renewable. We are happy to be established again in the Caldeiras and look forward to meeting all the inspiring people from all over the world.

name: King Fisher Village
description: The small village of Tarrafal at the "Punta de Atum" is still a sleeping beauty. A mysterious hideaway situated directly on the sea - one of the most beautiful places in the middle of the Atlantic. The sea is always warm here, the weather mostly beautiful and the days are accompanied by a healthy, refreshing ocean breeze. The eco-boutique hotel "King Fisher Village" has 3 apartments, 4 studios and 21 double rooms - each with terrace or balcony and equipped with sun chairs to enjoy the beautiful sunsets. Since May 2021, the King Fisher Village has been generating its own electricity through solar panels and there are plans to become even more sustainable in the future. Located directly by the sea, the King Fisher Restaurant spoils you with local culinary delights. Here you enjoy the extensive regional breakfast. In addition to the "à la carte" offer at lunchtime, we serve a high-quality 3-course menu every evening. The local crew presents a local and modern cuisine, with selected seasonal products from the region and our own gardens. The seawater infinity pool invites you to sunbathe and linger. We serve our homemade hibiscus caipirinha right up to the sun lounger and the quickest way to cool off is to jump straight into our King Fisher Bay. Snorkelling, diving, hiking or even biking are wonderful ways to switch off and enjoy the unspoilt nature.

name: Hotel Dunas De Sal
description:
See why so many travelers make Hotel Dunas de Sal their hotel of choice when visiting Santa Maria. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a charming setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Guest rooms offer air conditioning, a minibar, and a refrigerator, and Hotel Dunas de Sal makes getting online easy as free internet access is available.
You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a concierge. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast during their visit. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Santa Maria, Hotel Dunas de Sal is located a short distance from Funana Casa da Cultura (0.5 mi) and Paroquia de Nossa Senhora das Dores (0.8 mi).
Travelers looking to enjoy some tapas can head to Ocean Cafe, Sabores Livros Bar/Restaurante, or Londres Jazzy Bistro. Otherwise, you may want to check out an Asian restaurant such as Kossivi's International Restaurant & sushi or Nami - Asian Restaurant.
If you are interested in exploring Santa Maria, check out a garden, such as Viveiro, Botanical Garden & Zoo di Terra.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Hotel Dunas de Sal as you experience all of the things Santa Maria has to offer.

name: Hotel Santa Maria
description: O Hotel Santa Maria dispoe de excelentes acomodações no Centro Histórico da cidade da Praia, Plateau que também é o centro administrativo, cultural e económico do país. O nome do Hotel homenageia esta linda cidade, Praia de Santa Maria, que tem mais de 400 anos de história, reconhecido em 2013 com a classificação de Património Nacional. Definindo-se como um Hotel que celebra a música, o Hotel Santa Maria proporciona aos seus hóspedes uma viagem pelo universo da música tradicional cabo-verdiana, começando pelo design musical da recepção, aos pisos que apresentam estilos músicas diferentes, às suites que homenageiam grandes nomes da música de Cabo-verde.

name: Hotel Perola
description:
If you’re looking for a family-friendly hotel in Praia, look no further than Hotel Pérola.
Nearby landmarks such as Estadio Nacional de Cabo Verde (0.3 mi) and Presidential Palace (0.4 mi) make Hotel Pérola a great place to stay when visiting Praia.
Rooms at Hotel Pérola offer air conditioning, a refrigerator, and a minibar providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
Room service is one of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A pool and free breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special.
While staying in Praia, you can check out a popular cafe like Cafe Sofia-Copacabana Bar & Lounge, which is serving up some great dishes.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Praca Alexandre Albuquerque (0.5 mi), Igreja Nossa Senhora da Graca (0.5 mi), or Farol de D. Maria Pia (0.8 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
The staff at Hotel Pérola looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

description: The All Inclusive 24h Hotel Riu Palace Santa Maria will open its doors in February 2021 and is situated on an idyllic white sand beach on the island of Sal. RIU Palace is the most elegant category in the RIU hotel chain, with hotels that meet the highest standards in terms of luxury, excellence and sophistication, creating a unique experience. The location is ideal due to its proximity to Santa Maria (2 km)and airport (16 km). The hotel has 1001 comfortably furnished rooms with free Wi-Fi and offers many amenities. Relax in our Wellness Center and on our sunterrace, or get in shape in the gym. 5 outdoor pools, 1 indoor pool, 1children's pool and the “Splash Water World” water park. Day and evening entertainment. For gastronomy lovers, live cooking stations at our main buffet as well as Italian, Fusion, Japanese and Steakhouse specialty restaurants; 6 bars

name: Hotel Riu Cabo Verde
description:
El Hotel Riu Cabo Verde Todo Incluido 24 horas abre todo el año y está situado directamente en la playa más hermosa de la isla de Sal. Su ubicación es ideal por su proximidad al aeropuerto de Sal SID (15 km) y Santa María (1,5 km) e invita a explorar el entorno volcánico. El hotel dispone de 500 habitaciones acogedoramente amuebladas con WiFi gratuito y ofrece numerosas comodidades. Relájese en la zona de spa del vecino Hotel Riu Funana o, póngase en forma, en nuestro gimnasio. Dos piscinas al aire libre, una piscina infantil. Animación diurna y nocturna, Discoteca Pacha en nuestro hotel vecino. Para los amantes de la gastronomía, ofrecemos estaciones de cocina en vivo en el restaurante principal, italiano, restaurante Krystal Fusion y Steakhouse, así como 5 bares y nuestra Cappuccino Patisserie & Ice Cream Parlor.

name: Melia Tortuga Beach Resort & Spa
description: The 5 star Melia Tortuga All-Inclusive Resort is located in the southeast of the island Sal, only a few minutes from the colourful town Santa María and Amilcar Cabral international airport. During your stay you will find relaxation and fun right on the fabulous Algodoeiro beach, with its white sand and turquoise waters. The resort offers spectacular suites and villas with up to 4 bedrooms, private garden and swimming-pool. Set in gardens there are 2 magnificent adult pools and 2 pools for children. Experience Yhi Wellness with sauna, Turkish bath, whirlpool, thermal circuit, fitness facilities, massage and beauty treatments. Dining options include a variety of 4 restaurants and bars, offering a selection of international and local cuisine. The Melia Tortuga All-Inclusive is also the perfect destination for windsurfing, kitesurfing or scuba diving. Events for up to 200 people can be organised in 2 meeting rooms with natural daylight.

name: Sol Dunas
description: Sol Dunas, All Inclusive, is located right on the seafront at the white sandy Algodoeiro beach, opposite a coral reef with a large variety of marine wildlife. It is also an ideal option for discovering and getting to know the island of Sal in Cape Verde, with its natural beauty and eternal summer climate. The hotel offers free Wifi in its public areas and 4 spectacular swimming pools for adults and for children with slides. Full Yhi Spa facilities and free fitness are accessible at the next door hotel Melia Dunas. Dining options include Spices international buffet restaurant and Italian restaurant Il Terrazo with show cooking, while the Sol Grille cafeteria serves snacks and salads. There is an elegant pianobar and 3 poolbars, an amphitheatre for shows and theme parties, activities for kids and teenagers of all ages, 2 tennis courts and a Beach Volleyball court. Please advise the hotel of your expected arrival time, if you wish to use airport transfer service.

name: Hotel Riu Touareg
description:
El Hotel Riu Touareg Todo Incluido 24h está situado en la parte sur de la isla de Boa Vista directamente en la playa de arena y se extiende por una gran superficie. Cuenta con una zona SÓLO ADULTOS, donde los huéspedes disfrutan de servicios especiales. Los RIU Classic Hotels ofrecen cómodas habitaciones y excelentes instalaciones con grandes posibilidades de ocio y relajación, así como gastronomía internacional. Disfrute de unas vacaciones relajantes, ya sea solo, en familia, en pareja o con amigos. La ubicación es ideal por su proximidad al Aeropuerto Internacional Arístides Pereira (BVC-25km) y a Sal Rei (32 km) para explorar la zona. El hotel cuenta con 1151 habitaciones cómodamente amuebladas y ofrece muchas comodidades modernas. Relájese en la zona de spa o póngase en forma en el gimnasio. 5 piscinas al aire libre, 1 cubierta, piscina para niños, piscina para bebés y piscina sólo para adultos. RiuLand Kids Club (de 4 a 7 y de 8 a 12 años) y, para los adultos, animación diurna y nocturna. Para los amantes de la gastronomía, estaciones de cocina en vivo en nuestro restaurante principal. 6 restaurantes de especialidades y 7 bares.

#RiuParty en el Hotel Riu Touareg
¿Te gusta disfrutar de las mejores fiestas durante tus vacaciones? ¡RiuParty está hecho para ti! Baila al ritmo de la música de los mejores Dj's y transfórmate con los espectáculos y performance que te ofrece cada fiesta. ¡Aprovecha tu Todo Incluido y disfruta de la mejor diversión con RIU!

name: VOI Vila do Farol Resort
description: Located on Sal Island, the VOI Vila do Farol resort lies about 1 km away from Santa Maria, the main town, only a 20-minute drive from the international airport. It is immersed in a large garden overlooking the stunning beach. VOI Vila do Farol resort features 236 rooms housed in one-storey bungalows set along lovely lanes in a vast garden. The main meals are buffet served in the restaurant located in the main building, while a snack bar near the beach, a bar by the pool and a lovely bar in the lounge complete the offer. The main building includes a welcoming lounge with a reception desk, a disco, many boutiques, an internet point with wi-fi system, a multi-purpose room and a TV sat lounge. Between the main building and the seafront, a free-form swimming pool lies with a children section, surrounded by ample solarium terraces, and a separate plunge pool. Shady shelters and sun beds free as long as available by the pool and by the beach and towels. The beach is certainly one the main attractions of Sal. A shoreline of dazzling white sand extends for kilometres, lapped by the crystal clear water of sea characterized by unique colours… a true paradise for nature lovers.

name: Djunta Mo Art
description: Djunta Mo Art - Fair Trade Created in Cabo Verde- has 3 shops in Santa Maria. 1) Main street - Pedestrian Street Santa Maria; 2) Praia Santa Maria (Atlantis); 3) Hotel Farol Djunta Mo Art was created in 2013 with the aim of developing a sustainable market in the arquipelago. In Cape Verde local artisans face various difficulties, including competition from industrial souvenirs. Djunta Mo Art is committed to helping artisans with the primary focus of supporting people to continue working in their communities, safeguarding local traditions and giving particular support to small artisans, female entrepreneurs, cooperatives, but also elderly people and prisoners. Support often occurs from the moment of creation until the final sale. Djunta Mo Art is also the official distributor of the Women's Organization of Cape Verde project Mãos de Cabo Verde formed by women's cooperatives. It also supports the non-profit Association Nu Bai, whose main objective is to give scholarships.

name: Agua Hotels Sal Vila Verde
description: Located on Sal Island, 15 minutes from International Airport and only 2 km from Santa Maria, Água Hotels Sal Vila Verde is a Resort with 200 apartments as Studios, One bedroom Apartments and Two bedroom Apartments. All apartments have air conditioning, private safe,fully equipped kitchen, bathroom and balcony. The Resort also offers breakfast, dining and all inclusive services with 2 restaurants, 1 Pizzaria with Home Delivery & Take Away service, 1 Bar/Lounge, 1 Coffee Shop, 1 supermarket, 2 pool bars and a reception Open 24 hours. For those who enjoy sports, Vila Verde has two tennis courts, beach for surfing, a maintenance circuit and beach volley court. Vila Verde Resort has an evening entertainment program that includes theme nights with live music, between others. Ponta Preta beach, just 500m from the Resort, offers equipment rental for water sports, sun loungers, parasols and a lovely Beach Bar & Restaurant. A free shuttle service is available to the beach and to Santa Maria several times a day.

name: Melia Llana Beach Resort & Spa
description: On the beach, this 5-star all-inclusive resort for adults only is located on the island Sal. The picturesque town Santa Maria is less than 5km away. Enjoy the sun and the beach or relax in the Spa with sauna, steam room and whirlpool. Dining options include 4 restaurants and 4 bars offering Italian and Asian cuisine, an international buffet with show cooking and a grill. Rooms offer a bath with shower, free wifi, sitting area, mini fridge, safe and flatscreen tv. For guests looking for an even superior level of personalised service, the resort offers The Level services including access to The Level Lounge and private swimming-pool, exclusive rooms with coffee maker, bathrobes, flexible check-in and check-out hours and one entry to the thermal circuit in Yhi Spa per person per stay.

name: Hotel LIVVO Budha Beach
description: Characterized by its unique architecture and following the zen line, the building stands out for its natural colors and Oriental elements that make this space be harmonious. Hotel Budha Beach THe Senses Collection disposes of 35 rooms classified in four categories – all of them giving us breathtaking sea views. On the outside you will find the chill-out terrace Budha Beach Club. Here, you can freshen up at the infinity pool that merges with the sea, taste a delicious cocktail to the rhythm of live music at sunset, or just close your eyes, forget the rest of the world on the Balinese beds and let yourself be driven by the wave sounds. Budha Beach Club´s restaurant Mediaterráneo Fusion causes surprise due to its creative cuisine and the quality of its products. Doubtlessly, the fusion of aromas, colors and textures will create an explosion of flavors in your palate.

name: Hotel Riu Karamboa
description: The Hotel Riu Karamboa, which has been completely refurbished in 2022, is located on the marvellous island of Boa Vista, surrounded by a natural paradise, with stunning beaches and untouched landscapes. Located in an excellent beachfront location that enjoys a fantastic climate year-round, this Adults Only hotel offers the best 24-hour all-inclusive service so that you can enjoy an unforgettable holiday on Cape Verde. Our 950 rooms are perfectly equipped and decorated to guarantee a relaxing stay. Start your mornings by enjoying a buffet breakfast with live show-cooking. Cool off at our 5 pools and have a drink at the swim-up bar or have a swim in the sea by direct access to Praia das Dunas, Our amazing all-inclusive service offers snacks in bars and various dining options, where you can try the best international food and other specialties in the themed restaurants. You can enjoy our daytime entertainment, the Splash Water World water park and an endless number of sports, as well as live music and shows at night. Relax at the Renova Spa with the steam room, warm pool and a range of massages and treatments. Visit this paradise off the coast of West Africa and admire beautiful volcanic landscapes and white-sand beaches. Enjoy the island with RIU! #RiuParty at the Hotel Riu Karamboa Do you like going to top parties on your holidays? Then visit us and dance to the rhythm of top DJs and be carried away by the shows offered at each party.

name: Hotel Riu Palace Boavista
description:
El Hotel Todo Incluido 24 horas Riu Palace Boavista, abrió sus puertas en noviembre de 2018 y está situado en la isla de Boa Vista, con acceso directo a la playa Praia das Dunas y junto al Hotel Riu Karamboa. Palace es la categoría más elegante de la cadena hotelera RIU, con hoteles que cumplen con los más altos estándares en términos de lujo, excelencia & sofisticación, creando una experiencia única. Su ubicación es ideal por su proximidad al Aeropuerto Internacional Aristides Pereira BVC (1,5km), Sal Rei (8km) e invita a explorar la zona. El hotel dispone de 505 habitaciones acogedoramente amuebladas con Wi-Fi gratuito y ofrece comodidades modernas; habitaciones dobles Swim-up exclusivas para huéspedes mayores de 18 años. Relájese en nuestro spa o póngase en forma en el gimnasio. 3 piscinas exteriores, 2 con swim-up bar, piscina para niños. Animación diurna y nocturna, club infantil RiuLand, discoteca Pacha en Riu Karamboa. Para los amantes de la gastronomía, ofrecemos estaciones de cocina en vivo en nuestro restaurante principal; Fusión, restaurantes de especialidades japonesas, Steakhouse, 4 bares

#RiuParty en el Hotel Riu Palace Boavista.
¿Te gusta disfrutar de las mejores fiestas durante tus vacaciones? ¡RiuParty está hecho para ti! Baila al ritmo de la música de los mejores Dj's y transfórmate con los espectáculos y performance que te ofrece cada fiesta. ¡Aprovecha tu Todo Incluido y disfruta de la mejor diversión con RIU!

name: Hotel Vip Praia
description:
Looking for a place to stay in Praia? Then look no further than Hotel Vip Praia, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of Praia to your doorstep.
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Hotel Vip Praia offer air conditioning and a refrigerator.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, room service, and baggage storage. Guests of Hotel Vip Praia are also welcome to enjoy a rooftop pool and a poolside bar, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Praia, Hotel Vip Praia is located a short distance from Estadio Nacional de Cabo Verde (1.0 mi) and Presidential Palace (1.1 mi).
When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out O Poeta, Ipanema, and Terrazza Italia, which are some Mediterranean restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.
There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular historic sites such as Quartel Jaime Mota.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Hotel Vip Praia as you experience everything Praia has to offer.

It has a relaxed and welcoming atmosphere and is located in one of the most posh residential neighbourhoods of the city, close to the business, financial, educational and cultural centre of Cape Verde, with a dazzling view of the ocean. You can enjoy an outdoor salt water pool, fitness room and relax on the terrace located in the hotel's garden. If you so need, the hotel will arrange a free airport transfer, upon request. If you would like, you are welcome to park your vehicle in our private car park. For dining, the hotel offers a restaurant and a bar. The rooms in this Praia hotel are comfortable and feature contemporary decor, each with an LCD TV and free Wi-Fi.

name: Hotel MiraBela
description: Hotel MiraBela, formerly known as Les Alizés, is a small, charming Bed and Breakfast hotel built in 2001 in a traditional "Sobrado" style, typical for Portuguese colonial architecture. We are located on the pedestrianised main street in the heart of Santa Maria and less than 100m from the beach. Most bars and restaurants are just around the corner. We have 10 rooms equipped with bathroom, TV, private balcony and free Wi-Fi. The excellent breakfast, which is included in our prices, is on our lovely roof top terrace. It is a delight to sit there and see Santa Maria wake up or just to chill later in the day. Hotel MiraBela has new owners since May 2018. The owners and our new staff will make sure that you have a great time in our hotel. The values of our hotel are: Friendly, Clean, Cosy, Service Oriented. You will most definitely experience them as our guest. There is just something special about the personal touch at hotel MiraBela.

Welcome to Basic Hotel, your Mindelo “home away from home.” Basic Hotel aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.

name: Pure Yoga Magic: Yoga Cabo Verde
description: Yoga Cabo Verde is dedicated to teaching, improving and expanding your yoga by teaching all eight limbs of Yoga. Classes are on our ocean deck, literally surrounded by the ocean, and in our cozy Yoga studio. Every class is different and if you stay a week or two you will experience all the manifestations of yoga. Vinyasa, Hatha, Ashtanga, Kundalini, Iyenger, Sound Healing, Yin etc, meditation, breathing. Yoga will change your life into something amazing, if you take the time to learn it. Our classes are small so we can adjust your poses and actually teach yoga instead of having you just follow us. In addition, while staying at Hotel Pontao guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, a sun terrace, and currency exchange. You can also enjoy a pool and free breakfast. Need a place to park? Free parking is available at Hotel Pontao.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Paroquia de Nossa Senhora das Dores (0.2 mi) and Nazarene Church (0.2 mi), guests of Hotel Pontao can easily experience some of Santa Maria's most well known attractions.
During your visit, be sure to check out a popular Santa Maria jambalaya restaurant such as Restaurante Barracuda, which is a short distance from Hotel Pontao.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than Visoes Africanas, which is a popular Santa Maria art gallery – and it is conveniently located a short distance from the hotel.
Hotel Pontao puts the best of Santa Maria at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

name: Melia Dunas Beach Resort & Spa
description: The All-Inclusive Melia Dunas Beach Resort & Spa offers a unique luxury experience with superb service. It is located in the southwest of the island Sal (Cape Verde), a few minutes from the colourful city of Santa María and Amilcar Cabral international airport. While staying in the Melia Dunas Beach Resort & Spa you can find relaxation and fun right on the beautiful Algodoeiro beach with its white sands and turquoise waters. Reserve one of the spectacular suites or The Level villas with up to 5 bedrooms, private garden and swimming-pool. The Resort offers 5 magnificent adult pools and 2 children pools, which are surrounded by pretty gardens. Relax and unwind in the Yhi Spa with beauty, wellbeing and health treatments. The 6 restaurants and multiple bars, offer a wide variety of international and local cuisine, cocktails and long drinks. The Melia Dunas Resort is a perfect destination for windsurfing, kitesurfing and scuba dining fans. For an even superior level of personalised service the Melia Dunas Resort offers The Level with access to the private The Level lounge and pool, private check-in, in-room pillow menu, coffee machine, turn-down service, bathrobes, slippers and a complimentary water ritual in Yhi Spa per person per stay. The resort also offers a complete programme of activities, evening shows and live music.

name: VOI Praia de Chaves Resort
description:
The VOI Praia De Chaves is a wonderful property located on the heavenly island of Boa Vista, one of the happy islands that make up the Cape Verde archipelago, off the west coast of Africa.
The Resort is just 3 km from the airport and covers an area of 15,000 square meters near the beautiful beach of Praia De Chaves - on the west coast of the island - giving guests an incomparable view of the Atlantic Ocean.
The whole structure is harmoniously inserted in the enchanting natural context that characterizes the island of Boa Vista, known for the lunar landscapes of the Viana desert and the white beaches of Tortuga and Santa Monica.
Staying at the VOI Praia De Chaves you will have the opportunity to spend a fantastic holiday enjoying the highest quality services, with the opportunity to live many magical experiences, surrounded by dreamlike views.

See why so many travelers make Pensao Nha Terra their hotel of choice when visiting Santa Maria. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a budget friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Guest rooms offer air conditioning, and Pensao Nha Terra makes getting online easy as internet access is available.
In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and an on-site restaurant during their visit.
Close to some of Santa Maria's most popular landmarks, such as Eliseu (0.2 mi) and Funana Casa da Cultura (0.3 mi), Pensao Nha Terra is a great destination for tourists.
If you like Italian restaurants, Pensao Nha Terra is conveniently located near Chez Pastis, Marea Restaurant, and Baraonda.
There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular historic sites such as Paroquia de Nossa Senhora das Dores and Nazarene Church.

name: Cape Verde Sailing
description: Come explore the beautiful blue waters of the South West Coast of Sal on an exciting sailing adventure (3 hours trip). You'll have the chance to see amazing wildlife like turtles, dolphins, flying fish, and whales (no guarantee - nature is nature). Plus, you'll have the opportunity to swim and snorkel to explore the underwater sea life. Our boats are spacious and comfortable, but we always keep groups small so that we can give everyone the attention they deserve. Our crew is highly experienced and dedicated to safety and providing outstanding service. Including snorkeling equipment, WiFi, lunch on board, snacks and open bar.

description: Experiment Prassa 3 Boutique Hotel proposal. Come and stay. Love it and adopt it. Opened on 2015 in Mindelo, Boutique Hotel Prassa 3 wants to be another milestone in its motion for a quality tourism that we all want to Sao Vicente with city MINDELO as major reference. Built in a modern style, cozy and design, each of our suites has its unique decorative touch which makes stays here always something different every time. We put at your disposal a tapas bar, restaurant, free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel complex as well as various leisure support services to our guests. The hotel has 3 executive rooms, 8 suites (48m2) all with private balcony and 1 Master Suite (70m2) with two private terraces and unique view of the Amilcar Cabral Square (ex. Praça Nova), featuring all these mini bar, safe, air conditioning and cable television service. Finally everything for a stay either in Business or Leisure as pleasant as possible. This 4 stars hotel unit, in the heart of the historic and commercial center, is located in a privileged area of ​​Mindelo city. Its location allows to admire the landscapes of our bay and experience with comfort and safety the wide variety of culture and cuisine of this cosmopolitan city. Surrounded by countless entertainment venues, bars, restaurants and the National Center for Design and Crafts and the Cultural Center of Mindelo, it is located just minutes from some of the most visited historical monuments, such as the Municipal Market the first commercial building in the city, the Replica of the Tower of Belem, the People's Palace, the Fish Market, as well as the museum site Cesaria Evora our Diva Barefoot. Only 5 minutes from the emblematic Laginha Beach. In Prassa 3 Boutique Hotel, our guests are always treated with Glamour and Morabeza. For us the most important, is to make you feel at home even away from home.

Arlindo, guide indépendant local, vous fera découvrir l'authenticité de son pays et de son île, à travers la flore, la pêche,les traditions, les coutumes, les gens, rencontrés au cours de votre chemin! Il y en a pour tous les goûts et tous les niveaux, et les enfants y trouveront aussi leur plaisir!
Marie est votre intermédiaire en amont pour préparer ensemble votre programme personnalisé sur-mesure et pour une devis adapté.
Alors pour une découverte et une aventure incroyable au pays de la saudade, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter!!
﻿﻿Marcher, c'est voyager!
Arlindo (guide) et Marie (responsable clients, programme et devis)

name: Casa Cafe Mindelo
description: Casa Cafe Mindelo is a city touristic project in Mindelo, a town located in the bay of Porto Grande, one of the most beautiful bays in the world, on the island of Sao Vicente, Cape Verde. The house is situated on the coast road, surrounded by the historical area. Its 21 windows are overlooking the quiet ocean and the pulse of the streets ornamented with acacia trees and the bustle of people. The scenery is composed by markets, cars, saleswomen, churches, art studios, game corners, barber shops, fresh fish, tropical fruit, travelers, taverns and sailors. When the sun sets on Monte Cara, the housefalls asleep with the murmurs of the waves and the bohemian nightlife resonates far away in a warm voice, "It is sweet to die in the sea ...". Woden decor, private bathroom, frigobar, TV, ortopedic mattress, air conditioner, hair dryer, free Wi-Fi international library and an amazing terrace are part of the confort we have for you :)
address: Rua Governador Calheiros 6, Mindelo, Sao Vicente 2110 Cape Verde

roomTips.text: Not all rooms have a private bath room.

The top room is spacious and has three beds but gets indeed a bit warm as it is directly under the sun... upside is - you are right next to the terrace and have your own bathroom that you don't need to share with others in the rooms downstairs :)

Avoid the "shared" rooms "Sao Tome" and "Itaparica" facing the courtyard with absolutely no view, and where obviously the existing A/C isn't switched on. Wifi in these two rooms might not be received (signal too weak). The other 3 rooms "Djerba, Bali and Moorea" are ok; they are friendlier, airier and offer at least a view to the surroundings. We don’t know about wifi reception there – otherwise it’s only the ground floor left.
The rooms at the back are a bit more quiet. At the top is nice because of the roofterras next to the room.
The rooms are generally big and spacious. If it's the warmer season, you might enjoy the ones with air conditioning.

name: Hotel Central Santa Maria
description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Santa Maria, Hotel Central Sal is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its budget friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants, Hotel Central Sal makes it easy to enjoy the best of Santa Maria.
Rooms at Hotel Central Sal offer a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free internet access.
A 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and a sun terrace are some of the conveniences offered at this inn. Breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Hotel Central Sal, free parking is available.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Nazarene Church (0.1 mi) and Eliseu (0.1 mi), guests of Hotel Central Sal can easily experience some of Santa Maria's most well known attractions.
While staying in Santa Maria, you can check out a popular French restaurant like Le Privè, which is serving up some great dishes.
If you are interested in exploring Santa Maria, check out a garden, such as Viveiro, Botanical Garden & Zoo di Terra.
Hotel Central Sal is sure to make your visit to Santa Maria one worth remembering.
address: Rua das Salinas, Santa Maria, Ilha do Sal 4111 Cape Verde

name: Divin Art
description:
Welcome to Divin Art, your Ribeira Grande “home away from home.” Divin Art aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.
Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a gift shop while staying at Divin Art. In addition, Divin Art offers an on-site restaurant, which will help make your Ribeira Grande trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
When you're feeling hungry, you can check out Divin'Art (0.2 mi) or Cantinho de Amizade (0.7 mi), which are all within walking distance of Divin Art.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than Cova - Krater, which is a popular Ribeira Grande volcano – and it is conveniently located a short distance from the guest house.
Divin Art puts the best of Ribeira Grande at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

name: Simabo's Backpackers' Hostel
description: Simabo’s Hostel offers 9 rooms which are simply furnished but have everything you need for a relaxing stay. There are 3 large shared bathrooms and some rooms have a private bathroom and/or balcony. We do not have a boiler for hot showers but after a warm Cape Verdian day the water temperature is just about right! A fully equipped communal kitchen is at your disposal as well as a large communal living room. We also offer vegan breakfasts and meals which you can order separately. The hostel is 300m from the beach and main square, 200m from a small supermarket, and about 15mins walking distance from the ferry to Santa Antao (we also sell ferry tickets!). Last but not least: the Hostel finances our ONG Simabo, which takes care of the streets dogs and cats of the island. Final Note: The Cape Verdian government now charges a mandatory 2€ “Tourist tax” which is not included in our prices but can be paid separately.

name: Tortuga Bed & Breakfast
description: Welcome to Tortuga Bed & Breakfast, your "home away from home" in Sao Filipe. Tortuga Bed & Breakfast aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests keep coming back year after year. The rooms all with private bathroom offer services such as a desk and a mosquito net, and guests can go online with the free wifi offered by the bed and breakfast. Tortuga Bed & Breakfast features a 24-hour reception, express check-in and check-out and luggage storage, to make your stay more pleasant. In the structure there is also a restaurant where you can taste a multitude of fish caught by fishermen directly in front of the house, cooked only with local products to taste the flavors of Fogo. Free parking is available if you are driving to the Tortuga Bed & Breakfast. While you are here, be sure to visit Tortuga, one of the seafood restaurants also open to external guests that can be found in Sao Filipe, a short distance from the Tortuga Bed & Breakfast. (2 km from the center, accessible by a walk on the beach or by taxi (500 escudos)). reservations are required for dinner. If you are looking for something to do in the area, the historical center with the market of local products, the museum, the House of Memory and a visit to Djarfogo (small shop where you can taste and buy the famous Fogo coffee) are the popular attractions that located a few steps from the Tortuga Bed & Breakfast. Tortuga Bed & Breakfast puts the best of Sao Filipe at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

name: Tarrafal's Meeting Point
description: This is the first and only hostel in Tarrafal, Santiago, Cabo Verde. We have created an economic/eco-friendly space that is open and welcoming to people of all different backgrounds and cultures. We take pride in our sparkling clean rooms and personalized guest assistance. Tarrafal is the safest village on the island, boasting beautiful white and black sand beaches, mountains, a historical concentration camp, and humble people. Here at the hostel, you'll be able to meet and interact with both travelers and locals for a unique social experience. We are perfectly located in the center, right across from the municipal market where you can find fresh fish, produce, clothing, and other products. We are also footsteps from the Parque das Merendas (picnic park) where you can enjoy a big lunch for a small price (~2 euros). We can accommodate single travelers, families, or large groups up to 30 people. Prices start from 1200 escudos/night.

name: Residencia FSFA
description:
Finding an ideal family-friendly inn in Praia does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Residencia FSFA, a nice option for travelers like you.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Palacio da Justica (0.6 mi) and Presidential Palace (0.7 mi), guests of Residencia FSFA can easily experience some of Praia's most well known attractions.
The rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.
Residencia FSFA features a 24 hour front desk, a convenience store, and a coffee shop. In addition, as a valued Residencia FSFA guest, you can enjoy a fitness center and a lounge that are available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.
While in Praia, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Residencia FSFA, including 90 (Noventa) Bistro (0.3 mi), Punto d'Incontro (0.7 mi), and Cafe Sofia-Copacabana Bar & Lounge (0.4 mi).
If you’re looking for something to do, Praca Alexandre Albuquerque (0.6 mi), Igreja Nossa Senhora da Graca (0.6 mi), and Avenida 5 de Julho (0.4 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Residencia FSFA.
Residencia FSFA looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Praia.

name: Kiteboarding Club Sal
description: KBC Sal, the German kiteschool on Sal (Cape Verde) will make your dream of your first ride through the waves on a kiteboardcome true. Here you’ll find the best conditions for learning to wavekite. This is also where wavekite pro Mitu Monteiro trains. Gentle, well-tempered waves, warm water, reliable trade winds, a magnificent wide sandy white beach and the experienced German- and English-speaking team of professional kite instructors. You’ll be set up with the latest kite gear from F-ONE. At the centre, located right on the kite beach, you can relax with a cool drink on the sun terrace and enjoy fresh treats from the bar. And when you’re not kitesurfing, you can surf, SUP, take an excursion or explore the island’s vibrant nightlife. The Cape Verdean joie de vivre, the surf culture and a deep attachment to the sea all await you. Make friends for life and experience an unforgettable kite holiday in this wave surfer’s paradise. See you soon on Sal in Cabo Verde!

name: Hotel Estoril
description: Hotel Estoril in Boavista since 1999 offers a offers a comfortable and a friendly atmosphere. The accommodation consists in two blocks. The first, entirely covered in white stone has 21 double or twin rooms, simply furnished and individually decorated with colorful designs that speak of Africa and Cape Verde ..Each room is equipped with satellite tv, a small library in several languages, a ceiling fan, fridge and mosquito nets. The bathrooms are equipped with shower and bidet.The common parts are available to hotel guests comfortable hammock-chairs on which to lie down to read a book, a solarium with sun beds and parking. The attention to ecology is also known by the use of recycled materials and energy-efficient lighting.Cafe del mar (the hotel's outdoor restaurant run by the beautiful and friendly Jesuina) offers, especially for dinner, a la carte menu with Cape Verdean cuisine and European specialties, including pizza. Great cocktails to cool off after a day at the beach or a nice aperitif.Twice a week, the restaurant offers live music in the evening Cape Verde.The breakfast buffet offers a choice of varied and abundant fresh produce, consistent with their availability on the island.The second block of the hotel, called Hotel Cardeal, however, has 24 apartments (two of which are suites with terraces from which to enjoy a magnificent view of the sea) two or three rooms, ideal for up to 6 people, simply furnished, with a kitchen fitted of pots, plates and cutlery ..Cleaning and change of linen, hotel and residence, are usually provided twice a week, but on request and for a fee, they can become dailyThe whole structure is guarded by private security 24 hours 24.In reception you can find plenty of information about currency exchange, local telephone, the password for the wifi, rentals of bikes, quads and cars, nightlife, excursions and other news on the island.Island POS service works only with VISA card, and payments are currently accepted Verdean escudo and the euro.Estoril is 100 meters from the beach (with a variety of restaurants and surf schools) and 200 meters from the central square.
address: Johao Cristao, Sal Rei, Boa Vista 7666 Cape Verde

name: Sakaroule Bed & Breakfast
description: The Bed & Breakfast Sakaroule is situated in a typical Cape Verdean neighborhood, less than 5 minutes walk from the beach, in Santa Maria, Sal. Created by an italian-french couple this charming mansion covered in vibrant orange and with a stylish facade design inspired by dunes and waves, is a distinctive place in which you can experience local life while enjoying a holiday of relaxation and comfort. Open all year round and with residing-in guest relation managers, Simone and Sara, it offers single and double rooms with private bathroom, and studios with kitchenette, all pleasingly decorated and unique. A free of charge sport equipment storage is available. The breakfast offers marmelades, yogurt and cake home made. Sakaroule staff speaks English, Italian and Portuguese and offers assistance in organizing transport from and to the airport, renting cars, planning your activities and excursions on Sal. Daily prices: single room 28 euro with breakfast included- double room 36 euro (18 euro per person) with breakfast included- studio with kitchenette 42 euro (21 euro per person) without breakfast.

name: Residencial A Paz B&B
description: The Residential A Paz B&B, is located on the island of Boa Vista - Avenida 5 de Julho - Sal Rei. Boa Vista is one of the most beautiful islands of Cape Verde, due to its immense white dunes and the beautiful long beach's that surround it, making unforgettable his landscapes, ideal for a holidays. The terrace with views of the desert and the streets of Sal Rei is at your disposal to enjoy a sweet relaxation. The structure is composed of 8 spacious rooms all with private bathroom, furnished in natural wood and terracotta accessories, typical of the island of Boa vista, some with balcony and all with hot water and ceiling fans. Guests will be provided with key of the entry of the Residential, for a holiday of complete autonomy. The location could not be better, as it is located in the center of Sal Rei, which is the largest village on Boa Vista. By taxi it will take only 10 minutes to get from the Airport to A Paz. Because of his good location the visitors can get to the beach, supermarkets, bars and restaurants within easy walking distance. Although it is located in the center of Sal Rei the guests can reach the beach in a time of 5 minutes. This will be an absolute highlight, as Boa Vista is known for its beautiful beaches, more than 50 Kilometers. Near Sal Rei, the guests can enjoy surfing, windsurfing, kite surfing, snorkeling, diving, among others. "Come and enjoy your holiday with us. Friendly environment, young and familiar."

name: Hotel Aquamarina Suites
description: Literally, in the very heart of the Atlantic Ocean lies an enchanting place that will make you live quite an experience: Hotel Aquamarina Suites THe Senses Collection. On the Macaronesian island of Sal (Portuguese for “salt”) in Cape Verde, we find this resort that doubtlessly is a dreamy location to relax and get lost. Surrounded by an astonishing landscape, Hotel Aquamarina Suites THe Senses Collection disposes of 23 cozy rooms and a restaurant. The interior design evokes the sea: the decoration follows the zen lines with oriental elements, so that you can find the peace and the harmony to fully enjoy your vacations. Naturally, the charming indoor patio is the place to rest in the comfortable furnishing while the sunlight reaches you from above. Located in the fishing town of Santa María, Hotel Aquamarina Suites THe Senses Collection is not only one step away from the paradisiacal waters, but also in a touristic enclave offering a great gastronomic choice and leisure activities. As the inhabitants of this exceptional island, this is how our staff is: hospitality and naturalness are the essence of the service and the treat we offer you. Spectacular views and a lovely location: this is all you need to enjoy a perfect vacation on a piece of Africa in the middle of the Atlantic.

name: Hotel Chateau Georgette
description: Hotel Château Georgette is a themed hotel built in 2019. It features colonial architecture, being stylized like a castle, which is the intended concept. The main objective is to offer guests an experience worthy of royalty, where they are surrounded by comfort, luxury, various facilities, equipment and services of a high standard. The intention is to combine the useful to the pleasant with the union of three elements in perfect harmony: nature, luxury, and sustainability. The Hotel was conceived by a local architect and the interior design is by Georgette's daughter. In order to introduce visitors to the amazing work of local artists, the designer worked together with them and created a stunning castle themed interior. The hotel is perfect for combining work with relaxation. It offers high-speed wifi, air conditioning, nine spacious suites with smart TVs, telephone, chandeliers, hairdryer, minibar, safe, tea corner, spacious king-size beds with 35cm thick mattresses, art-filled headboards, and a 77m2 hostel with 8 double bunk beds. Regarding amenities, you will find air conditioning, smart TV, minibar, telephone, safe, hairdryer, make-up mirror, shower gel, bathrobe, and a tea/coffee corner.

name: EcoFunco
description: Funcos are the traditional houses of Chã das Caldeiras. They have a circular shape and the facade is made of volcanic stone. In the EcoFunco version, each bedroom has its own private bathroom with hot water. In an ecological concern, the furniture is made of pallets. Rainwater is captured to supply the well and the water used is recycled and reused to water the plants and to flush the toilets. Electricity comes from solar panels and we have water heated by a solar water heater. Unlimited WiFi is also available for guests. Located at the foot of the volcano, EcoFunco is the ideal place to discover Chã das Caldeiras and the starting point for hikes (ascent of the volcano, via ferrata, descent to Mosteiros, trekking in the Bordeira).

name: Farinha de Pau Eco B&B
locationString: Tarrafal de Sao Nicolau, Sao Nicolau
description: We work with the Taste and Sustainable Tourism. It's a kind of tourism that is fleeing from mass tourism to something more original and authentic. The feelings, sensations, smell, smiles are the goods that we like to offer to our guests. Welcome! FARINHA DE PAU - TASTE and TRADITIONAL TOURISM FARINHA DE PAU is a guesthouse specialized in providing a relaxing place where to stay with all the traditional feelings of Sao Nicolau Island in Cape Verde. Farinha de Pau has special offers for adventurous tourists to hike, mountain bike, dive, kite and surf. We invite you and your family to come experience the wealth of beauties and endless opportunities that Sao Nicolau has to offer. We have a very good map with the best hike tracks on the island, and we give all support about it. Our philosophy is ecologically minded and we use only locally hand made crafts and decorations for our home. It's 28 € per person at least 2 nights, with breakfast! Independent if is single or group. We recommend a complete meal service with Lunch and Dinner. All food is from the island and produced without chemicals. Our guest can access all house, specially in the garden, where we have a nice chillout place. In our house we like to offer a personal and friendly service for our guest. Our neighborhood is calm and friendly, with family houses around. Normally we sleep with the window opened during the night because it's so safe. We are close the sea and some beaches, and you can go walking to there. The transport in Sao Nicolau is limited. Is normal to wait a lot for a transport to go or come back from the hike. Because this, we have a airport transfer (30€ - 45 km) and hike transfer. We put the people on the beginning of the way, and we combine with the group to meet with them, on the end of the hike, and bring them. The value of the services depends on the distance to drive. We have some services here like lunch, dinner, laundry and day tour. Here in the house we try to use only natural food, direct from the garden or fresh fish. Of course sometimes we need to use rice or pasta, and these products come from outside. But we don't use Knorr or other chemicals to give flavor, nor too much oil or salt, it's all very natural and healthy. Lunch: 10 € Dinner: 12 € The day tour is a tour on the west shore of the island, all day long. We like to stop on the places and enjoy it. Not only stop for photo and go. We can organise tour for other island spots too. Day tour - English guide, car, fuel, water : 80 € (this value is divided by the group)

name: Residencial Casa Angela
description:
Residencial Casa Ângela is located in Espargos, within 1.1 km of Monte Curral and 8.8 km of Pedra Lume Salt Crater. The property is situated 11 km from Buracona the Blue Eye, 17 km from Viveiro, Botanical Garden & Zoo di Terra and 20 km from Nazarene Church. The guest house features family rooms.

Each room includes a private bathroom, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace and others also offer a city view.

A buffet, à la carte or continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Around the clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak English, Spanish, French and Portuguese.

Funana Casa da Cultura is 20 km from the guest house, while Parish of Our Lady of Sorrows is 20 km away. The nearest airport is Amílcar Cabral International, 1 km from Residencial Casa Ângela, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
address: Rua Abel Djassy, Espargos, Ilha do Sal 4110 Cape Verde

name: Residencial Lima
description:
Finding an ideal guest house in Ribeira Grande does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Residencial Lima, a nice option for travelers like you.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, and you can go online as Residencial Lima offers guests free wifi. Guests are also welcome to enjoy barbeque facilities, located on site.
If you’re looking for something to do, Cova - Krater is a nice way to spend some time.
Residencial Lima puts the best of Ribeira Grande at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.
